short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick view of google chrome bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It shows a quick view of google chrome bookmarks sorted by folders and a special folder that shows all the bookmarks. It also implements a search engine to find the bookmark you are looking for faster and a link to access the bookmarks management page.
